I was able to join my friend who has a legitimate copy. All you need to do with who ever is hosting is; edit the server.properties file (which is found in the same folder as the minecraft_server.exe file). Edit the file and change the online-mode option to false (instead of true). Restart the miencraft server and it should fix the problem.
